{{About | about = SAM '''{{PAGENAME}}''' | usage = the Swedish version | link = ItO 90M }} {{Specs-Card |code=fr_crotale_ng |images={{Specs-Card-Image|GarageImage_{{PAGENAME}}.jpg}} }} == Description == The '''{{Specs|name}}''' is a rank {{Specs|rank}} French SPAA {{Battle-rating}}. It was introduced in [[Update "Red Skies"]]. == General info == === Survivability and armour === {{Specs-Tank-Armour}} The tank gets almost no armour, so you are best off hiding or staying at your teams spawn and being an SPAA. Even light machine guns can kill you. '''Armour type:''' * Rolled homogeneous armour (Hull, Vents) * Bulletproof glass (Windows) * Wheel (tires, suspension bars) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Armour !! Refrain from creating a "guide" - do not impose a single point of view but instead give the reader food for thought. Describe the most dangerous enemies and give recommendations on fighting them. If necessary, note the specifics of the game in different modes (AB, RB, SB).'' === Pros and cons === '''Pros:''' * One of the longest ranges in the game at a maximum range of 12 km * VT1 missiles come stock and they are very fast * Has access to gen 1 gunner thermals * Can fire all 8 missiles without reloading '''Cons:''' * 8 mm of all-around armour is insufficient to stop even .50 cal machine guns * Search radar when unfolded sticks out quite far giving it a very tall profile * Lacks any sort of self-defence against ground targets * Lacks any sort of mobility offroad or uphill == History == ''Describe the history of the creation and combat usage of the vehicle in more detail than in the introduction. If the historical reference turns out to be too long, take it to a separate article, taking a link to the article about the vehicle and adding a block "/History" (example: https://wiki.warthunder.com/(Vehicle-name)/History) and add a link to it here using the main template. Be sure to reference text and sources by using , as well as adding them at the end of the article with .
